name: Slight Setback
description:
Slight Setback is a puzzle game where you'll have to place explosive in a factory to blew up the robots inside ! 

Interact with the different elements of the factory, place the right bombs and activate them at the right time to be the most efficient possible.


The game is still in development so jump into the discord to give your ideas, report bugs or simply follow the progression ! (https://discord.gg/4zWj686)
